price: 49. Kuwa ka baqa Rabbigood sir (iyo saaqba)13, iyagoo Saacadda (Qiyaame) ka cabsan.
arabic: ٱلَّذِينَ يَخۡشَوۡنَ رَبَّهُم بِٱلۡغَيۡبِ وَهُم مِّنَ ٱلسَّاعَةِ مُشۡفِقُونَ
footnotes: 13. Waxaa loola jeedaa Iyagoo aan arag ama iyagoo keli ah aan cidna u jeedin.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: alladhīna yakhshawna rabbahum bil-ghaybi wahum mina al-sāʿati mush'fiqūna
